properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued January 5 at 11:50AM CST until January 6 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
* WINDS AND WAVES...West to west northwest winds gusting to 45
mph will build waves to 6 to 9 feet and occasionally to 12
feet along the Porter County shore.

* TIMING...3 PM this afternoon through tonight.

* IMPACTS...The increasing wave action this afternoon and
tonight, combined with ongoing shoreline erosion may result in
additional lakeshore flooding along the Porter County
shoreline. The water may threaten some roads near the lake,
including Lakefront Drive in the Beverly Shores area.
properties.instruction:
A Lakeshore Flood Advisory indicates that onshore winds will
generate flooding of low areas along the lakeshore.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 AM CST MONDAY
